title: Convert Text to Coloring Page
subtitle: Describe your idea and generate a black & white coloring-book style line art.
queueHint: If queued, it may take about 1–3 minutes.
emptyLine2: Use the prompt panel to generate a coloring page.
promptDesc: Describe the scene. Keep it concise for best results.
placeholder: For example: a wooden box in nature
footerNote: Output: black & white refined lineart, high-contrast outlines, coloring-book style.
softTimeout: Still generating… If it times out, retry. The task may be queued.
timeout: Generation timed out. Retry in a moment (task may be queued).
promptLangHint: Tip: Presets insert English prompts for more stable results.
